title: The use of deep eutectic solvents as promising approach in the design of microwave-based green gas sensors
content:

This study investigates a new kind of sensitive layer composed of choline chloride-urea deep eutectic solvent for microwave gas sensor application to detect HCl vapor. The sensing microwave device is...
